ptxt.intxrefpoff: Common Rail (High Pressure Fuel Injection Rail) Removal and Installation:F9Q

attention2.ptxt: Never remove fuel rail pressure sensor from common rail because this may cause fuel circuit contamination problems.
If fuel rail pressure sensor fails, common rail and all high pressure pipes must be replaced.

s1.ptxt: Remove fuel injector cover referring to Step 2) through 7) of “Removal” under High Pressure Pipe Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Check for fuel rail pressure sensor (1) and its terminal for damage.
If damage is found, replace common rail referring to Common Rail (High Pressure Fuel Injection Rail) Removal and Installation:F9Q .
